item.title: EECS 494 Porject 1: Legend of Adlez
item.description: This is a remake of the first version of Legend of Zelda released by Nintendo in 1986 on NES. This remake includes a revision of the original Dungeon level and most of the core mechanics shipped with the game. We also added a few new features to the game. I want to keep it a secret here. You can play and explore it all by yourself. Press X to use your sword and Z to use your alternative weapon (exactly what it was in the original NES game).

item.title: EECS 494 Project 2: Swapper
item.description: This is a platform puzzle game for 2 players. You have to cooperate with your partner to complete the given tasks.
